creations.title: Aspect
creations.description: It is a performance that plays with the feminine and masculine gender, human relationships influenced by the other's gender. How do we see a woman? In society, in a couple, with another woman? Is our gender defined only by our sex?

creations.title: Cellular Dance
creations.description:
CellularDance is an artistic creation on the theme of replacing human by machines. Five dancers from the Dance-Studies section of INSA Lyon evolve in various choreographic scenes where present and near future, oppression and liberation, human and virtual are intertwined.

Thanks to a Kinect camera, the dancers' movements are captured and modify the background projection. By this way they are immersed and take you with them. Illusions, poetry, psychedelia, everything becomes possible!

creations.title: Beyond words
creations.description:
Words surround us, they frame our thoughts, justify our emotions, trigger our ideas... But do they really reflect what we want to say? Isn't it a code that could hinder our sincere expression?...Maybe only the single sound of one’s voice is enough to make himself understood.
In this solo, the body dialogues with those voices; words vanish and give space to the expression...

Solo de 6 minutes sur la musique '23:52' de Nils Frahm & Olafur Arnalds

Prix : 2e prix du concours “Danse avec ton Crous” édition 2017/2018.

creations.title: Terre En-Corps
creations.description:
Bodies energy and matter inhabit space, bind and unbind, damage and transform themselves. Crossed visions of the earth, dance and society, Terres en-Corps explores the duality of nature and human sophistication. It also confronts physical struggles and poetry by questioning the earth's social and cultural values

A choreographic, musical, luminous and plastic creation, written under the direction of the Lanabel Company (Annabelle Bonnéry, François Deneulin) featuring students from the INSA Lyon Dance-Studies section, also in collaboration with the INSA Lyon Music-Studies and Technical-Studies section.

50 minutes show interprated by the 'danse-etudes' of INSA Lyon.

creations.title: Perspectives
creations.description:
As a Human beings, what is our position in space, time, our relationship to the other? Working with the architecture and spatial contrasts... Trusting the fall to (re)find elsewhere.

A choreographic creation directed by Désoblique Company featuring students from the INSA Lyon Dance-Studies section, also in collaboration with the INSA Lyon Music-Studies and Technical-Studies section.

creations.title: Mille
creations.description: "Test, repeat, refine, amplify... . Which strength ? Which intensity ? How far ? Which way ? Is there a meaning to all of this ? Through the pleasure of music and dance. We explore with passion."

creations.title: Duet
creations.description:
I have lots of ideas, I'm full of desires. You, me, just us, similar but different, each of us with our own jacket. I want us to go back, to make people smile red and cry blue, to make them want to run away, to attract people. You're my half. I have a lot of love for you, a fraternal love, which destroys a little and builds a lot. I want to show you ways, that you see me go astray, that we guide each other, that we fight, that we love each other blue, that we adore each other red, that we go through pains and desires, silences and passions. You are my most loyal competitor and my most beautiful conquest. You fill my memories, you inhabit my past; we agree and disagree, and yet unison is always present

Musiques de Valentin Stip : Correlation // Nwia

creations.title: Corbeaux
creations.description: Performance of Corbeaux by Bouchra Ouizguen - Compagnie Ô at the 2017 Biennale de La Danse. Voluntary participation with selection
